[Desc]               <blue>You are Spencer Hawthorne, co-founder of Borgasm Co., and technology extraordinaire. Your current company is the innovator of the "Pleasure-Bot", a robot pleasure giver, though the media has latched onto the phrase "robo-sex dolls", which while it may be accurate, it certainly isn't all the PBs can do. The reason it irks you so is... you're actually a very chaste man. Near asexual. Yes, you have a loving wife and son, but it was in vitro, and yes, you run a company that sells "sex machines", but the sexual side of the devices are handled by your partner, Buckley "Buck" Bicorn, where you handle the specs. Alas, since Bicorn is rather secretive, you have been marked as the head of the company. 
You're actually here for a bit of PR management. The media hasn't stopped slamming your company for its "perversion", and you're in this gameshow to donate the winnings to charity. Ironic, as this show is notorious for turning people into rabid sex fiends. Even though you're nervous of the outcome should you lose, you feel confident in your abilities. After all, you might have wrote the code for this very show.</blue>;
[LoseDesc]               <pink>Nothing remains of the man you once were, and you can't remember him anyways. All that's left is Alexia Vulp, a nympho fox that's just started her heat. After selling that weird sex company to Mr. Bicorn for a couple of droids and a blowie, you set off on your continual quest to fuck every type of man, of every type of species. While you don't think you'll get close to finishing it any time soon, you don't really mind. This whole town really is a pussy, and you're just waiting to get fucked.</pink>;
